actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority recommended in the message of the President of September 22, 1976 (H. Doc. 94-620), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority in the amount of $47,500,000 for the Helium Fund, Bureau of Mines (H. Doc. 94-620), pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority recommended in the message of the President of September 22, 1976 (H. Doc. 94-620), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
